attributes.action: Ban all home videos involving animal cruelty eg YouTube
attributes.additional_details: Because the deliberate cruelty, suffering and even death that is caused to sentient beings in the name of money and cheap entertainment should be recognised as completely inappropriate and abhorrent. Therefore legal consequences should result from these actions.
attributes.background: To make it illegal and a criminal offence to cause any suffering to animals and then film it.

rejection.details:
It is already an offence to cause unnecessary suffering to an animal: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/animal-welfare

It is also a specific offence to publish or show films involving animal cruelty: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/Edw8and1Geo6/1/59/section/1
